head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths WANGENHEIM, HANNI ELIZABETH.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths WANGENHEIM, HANNI ELIZABETH.

block.p: WANGENHEIM-Hanni Elizabeth. Entered into rest October 10, 2000. Dearly beloved sister of Clementine Tabatchnik, Jenny Benson and the late Marga Reimann; devoted aunt of Martina and Daniel Jackson. Great aunt of Catherine Jackson-Walley and great, great aunt of Rebecca Elizabeth Margaret Jackson-Walley, wherever you are there is style and laughter.

WANGENHEIM-Hanni Elizabeth. Entered into rest October 10, 2000. Dearly beloved sister of Clementine Tabatchnik, Jenny Benson and the late Marga Reimann; devoted aunt of Martina and Daniel Jackson. Great aunt of Catherine Jackson-Walley and great, great aunt of Rebecca Elizabeth Margaret Jackson-Walley, wherever you are there is style and laughter.
